articles.title: Kirkus Reviews Praises Animal Intelligence
articles.description: Kirkus Reviews praised Animal Intelligence as “a rich and surprising alternative vision of the past” and awarded it the Get It badge, recognizing it as a standout editorial recommendation.

articles.title: Animal Intelligence Featured in The European
articles.description: The European highlighted Animal Intelligence for its imaginative approach to history, blending philosophy, illustration, and animal storytelling into a long-term, knowledge-driven project.
